Package common

Class MyFile

java.lang.Object
common.MyFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MyFile extends Object implements Serializable
MyFile class represents a serializable object for storing file data. It includes attributes such as file name, size, byte array, and description. This class allows initialization of a byte array, setting and getting file attributes, and serializing/deserializing file data.
See Also:
